author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hp Inc Sets Cash Dividend Of $0.1393per Share
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - HP Inc:
* INC. BOARD DECLARES DIVIDEND * SETS CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.1393PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
